short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to upload FAA Score Report PDFs and get a decoded report.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The FAA Knowledge Code Extractor is a user-friendly tool specifically designed for pilots and aviation enthusiasts. This Google Chrome extension allows users to easily decode their FAA Knowledge Test Score Reports, providing a seamless experience and efficient results.

Are you wondering how you can improve your future FAA Knowledge Test Scores? With our extension, you can quickly upload your PDF Score Report, and we will provide a breakdown of the knowledge areas you need to focus on for improvement.

What makes the FAA Knowledge Code Extractor stand out is its ability to convert the cryptic FAA codes from your Score Report into a comprehensive and understandable format. By using this extension, users can gain insights into their FAA knowledge test results, allowing them to pinpoint their weaknesses and focus on the areas that require further study.

To get started, simply upload one or more PDF files containing your FAA Knowledge Test results, and our extension will do the rest. Once your report is decoded, you can download a clear, easy-to-read PDF report detailing each knowledge area you were tested on.

Additionally, our extension values your privacy and does not store any personal data from your Score Report. All processing is done locally on your machine, ensuring your data remains secure and private.

Get the FAA Knowledge Code Extractor today and make your FAA Score Reports more understandable and actionable, assisting you in becoming a better, more informed pilot!

Features:

Simple, user-friendly interface.
Fast processing and decoding of FAA Knowledge Test Score Reports, including but not limited to Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, Flight Instructor, even Part 107, ATP, AMP, AMG, AMA knowledge tests.
Provides clear and comprehensive output, detailing the knowledge areas for improvement.
Safe and secure with no data storage or collection. All processing is done locally on your machine.
Includes helpful resources and links for additional study and clarification.
Receives continuous updates and improvements to ensure accurate and efficient results.
Designed by an experienced pilot, this tool is tailored to meet the needs of both students and experienced aviators alike.

Version 1.1 - Speed Improvements, and Updated Code database. 

Version 1.0 - Initial Launch.
